<page title>: Cleverboxes - PLE2273HDS-B1 | Iiyama ProLite E2273HDS 56 cm (22") LED LCD Monitor - 16:9 - 2 ms - Adjustable Display Angle - 1920 x 1080 - 16.7 Million Colours - 250 cd/m² - 1000:1 - Speakers - DVI - HDMI - VGA - Black - Energy Star, TCO Displays 5.2
marketing information: The ProLite E2273HDS is a LED-backlit monitor. It is a full 1920x1080 high definition 22" display that features all the benefits this technology affords. Extremely slim and stylish in design, it has a narrow bezel and is finished in the latest glossy-black. The high specifications of the monitor include 5,000,000:1 ACR, fast 2ms response for excellent sharpness in high definition video and triple input connectivity (including HDMI). Power consumption is only 21W typical usage and 0,5W in standby.
package contents: ProLite E2273HDS Widescreen LCD Monitor Power Cable D-Sub Cable DVI Cable Audio Cable Stand Cable Guide Quick Start Guide Safety Guide
